email.title: Weekly Digest
email.text:
Welcome back! We hope you had a well-deserved, enjoyable break and are feeling refreshed for another term.
Over the next term, DoCSoc will be holding our yearly flagship events, IC Hack 19 and Revel. We'll also be continuing our usual series of social events, including bar nights, trips and more! Be sure to stay updated over our social media channels (especially Facebook!) and weekly digest emails.
email.heading: DoCSoc Merch Update
email.text: For those of you who ordered DoCSoc-branded merchandise last term, we will be following up with pick-up times over the coming weeks.
email.heading: Post-Haskell Curry Night (Freshers Only)

event.location: Sheba Brick Lane, 136 Brick Lane, London, E1 6RU
event.text:
Now that you've finished your first major exam at Imperial, we want you to take a well-deserved break and enjoy the delicious curry dishes of the famous Brick Lane, on us!
So whether you want to celebrate smashing the exam or drown your sorrows in tikka masala, come join your fellow coursemates at the Sheba Restaurant on Sunday 13th Jan at 5pm for a great time and great food!
ONLY first year Computing and JMC students are allowed to purchase tickets - they will be revoked otherwise.
Tickets will be released on Eventbrite - more information coming soon!

email.heading: IC Hack 19 - Batch Two Ticket Release

event.text:
24 hours. Amazing prizes. Are you ready for IC Hack 19?
Running for its eighth consecutive year, weâ€™re bringing over 400 of the UK's most creative and talented students together for 24 hours of learning, building, fun, and networking on the weekend of 26-27th January 2019. Come create something cool!
IC Hack 19 Powered By Cisco will be hosted on Imperial College London's South Kensington campus.
The **second batch of tickets** will be released on the **10th of January at 1:30pm GMT**, so don't miss out! The first batch sold out in under 15 seconds. Did we mention all tickets are completely free?
